name: Alira
description:
A Emotional 3D Plataform Game!

A teenager's emotional journey and her grief over losing her mother. As she isolates herself in the forest, she discovers magical places that may be able to bring her mother back


Fennec Dreams Team

Artist: Daniel Tibana

Artist: Dara Gushiken

Artist: Filipi Gushiken

Artist: Isabella Pereira

Artist: Lucca Menegon

Developer: Fabio Yoshikawa

Developer: Felipe Vicente

Developer: Laís Dolfini

Sound Designer: Gustavo Vianna

Game Designer: Victor Valdo
